name: MET Geosatellite
description:
Images from geostationary satellites.

This service delivers images captured by geostationary satellites, in the visible and infrared spectra. New images are produced every hour.

Images are provided for a specified area and specified time. If no time is given, the latest available image will be returned.

When importing this API, please set `https://api.met.no` as URL when prompted.
